title-group.article-title: Two new species of Begonia (Begoniaceae) from Borneo

fig.label: Fig 1
fig.caption: Begonia mentewangensis. A habit; B male ﬂower; C female ﬂower; D fruit. PHOTOS: DEDEN GIRMANSYAH.

fig.label: Fig. 2
fig.caption: Begonia mentewangensis. A habit; B open male ﬂower; C male ﬂower tepal with hairs on dorsal side; D stamen; E pistil; F fruit; G fruit in cross section; H female ﬂower; J female ﬂower tepals; K stipule; L seed; M bract and bracteole. DRAWN BY ANE

fig.label: Fig. 3
fig.caption: Begonia dolichobracteata. A habit; B male ﬂower; C female ﬂower; D fruit. PHOTOS: DEDEN GIRMANSYAH.

fig.label: Fig. 4
fig.caption: Begonia dolichobracteata. A habit; B stamens; C female ﬂower; D male ﬂower; E stipule; F bract; G bracteole; H fruit in cross section; J seed; K pistil; L fruit. DRAWN BY ANE KUSUMAWATI.
